website_summaries.verdict: The Asics Gel Foundation 12 is a motion control shoe that gives responsive and comfortable cushioning for both short and long running sessions. The layered stability and full guidance system help runners experience a smoother ride. The shoe gathers mixed reviews from users but overall, the Foundation 12 is considered by some as a successful update.
pros: Lightweight and breathable coverage is provided by the Engineered mesh in the upper
The 12th version of the Gel Foundation features the ComforDry Sockliner, which provides additional cushioning while reducing moisture and odor
Synthetic Overlays offer an improved fit while the Seamless Upper Construction ensures a non-irritating sleeve for sockless wearing
It has SpEVA in the mid-sole for efficient energy return and the Gel Cushioning System in the heel and forefoot areas for shock absorption
Stability is afforded by effective mid-sole components, such as the DuoMax Support System and the Guidance Trusstic System
Most runners took note that the Gel Foundation 12 is a well-cushioned shoe that is also flexible
cons: Some runners felt this version needed more depth in the toe box because they felt their toes rub uncomfortably against the upper fabric of the shoe
There were complaints stating that the underfoot stability mechanics were not efficient as it rendered the foot stiff and unable to move naturally

customer_reviews.title: Loving
customer_reviews.text: Go up half a size. Other than that they are the most supportive workout shoes I've bought. No more chin pain or feet pain. The stability they give during workouts is amazing. Writing this 6 months after purchase. They are still functioning like brand new with working out 3x a week (cardio sculpt, walking/running, strength training).
customer_reviews.author: Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Good for heavy people and big feet
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these particular shoes ive purchace. They were used for walking on concrete all day at my job and were recomended to me as im a fairly large person. 6'4" 320lbs, plus I'm flat footed. Were pretty comfrotable and provided support where i needed. I put probably 15 or so miles on them a day at work so wore out pretty quick but never had any major blow outs or had sole come apart. Would recommend if have large feet and walk quite a bit. They are sorta mesh so will breathe quite well but not good keeping heat if in colder area.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent running shoes. I have wide feet so these fit me nicely. Arch support is also good, though not as great as Brooks Beast. My only serious complaint is that the uppers of these shoes are very flimsy mesh. I guess mesh is supposed to provide more ventilation and its not quite clear to me that it does. However, the mesh tears in 6-8 months usage (~500 miles) even though I keep my toenails cut flush with my toe. I wish the company would use a more long-enduring material for the upper.
customer_reviews.author: A.R.Viewer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointly not durable
customer_reviews.text: Durability F. Comfort A. Foot support A. Appearance A. I wish these shoes were more durable. I only use these shoes for walking and zero running. They still look like new and the soles are in great condition, but the mesh above the toes have worn through. My nails are trimmed short so this is not the issue. The mesh is just too shear. I need another pair already, but as much as I love these shoes I cannot buy another pair. They need to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Opened box and he said awesome. That's a huge compliment from him; he started breaking them in right away. This sneakers' length size is closely made to actual foot length. We buy between two brands; other sneaker sized a half inch longer to the foot size and this one requires selecting a half size more to allow for workouts/foot wear throughout day if preferred. Bought regular width. No complaints yet. He is active and puts sneakers through challenging wear; can update in a while after he has used them for his everyday training. TypicalIy due to activities we go through a pair in half year with other brands. We immediately treat with protectant to extend life of fabric/leather detail.
customer_reviews.author: tigerina

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Wonderful Cushion and Wide
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I have very painful feet due to nerve damage. I have been searching for a shoe with wide width and a LOT of cushion. I was reading a review of this shoe from someone who returned them due to too much cushion. He said he felt like he was running in mud. That sounded perfect so I bought them. Couldn’t be happier unless perhaps they were waterproof. My use of pain meds has also decreased. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: No more plantar fasciitis!
customer_reviews.text: I first bought these last year and just got a replacement this year. I used to get pretty bad flare ups of my plantar fasciitis and since I began using these shoes, I thankfully have had no issues. My feet don't feel as tired either. Definitely great for overpronators!
customer_reviews.author: Walt B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: If you were looking for a true to size product and comfort these are the best on the market and I’ve tried just about everything. I am blessed with a size 15 four wide and these I can buy right out of the box and they fit without any kind of construction work done to them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for Flat Footers
customer_reviews.text: As someone who should order custom inserts because of how bad my flat feet are, these give relieving comfort. I'm not that fond of the design but the colors have grown on me. I suggest breaking them in for several weeks before trying to run or stand for long periods of time. Other than that, they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W.

customer_reviews.title: Saved $60.00 at Amazon for a very similar shoe!  More sizes than last time!  Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: The husband likes these just as much as the last ones he got from the name brand shoe company, and these cost $60.00 less! The reviewers helped me get him a half size larger, which fits just fine. I checked Amazon first, last time, but they did not have his size. Looks like Amazon got more sizes in this Podiatrist recommended brand. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: ... I found this one and he raves about how comfortable they are for him
customer_reviews.text: My husband has flat feet and Asics gel Nimbus has been shoe he has been wearing but then I found this one and he raves about how comfortable they are for him. He has bunions too and these shoes are good for his bad knees and sometimes back issues. So glad we found these.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Welty

customer_reviews.title: Sensible Shoes
customer_reviews.text: As Kate Sessions said, "I'm thankful that I can wear sensible shoes and can walk with comfort all day long." That is exactly what these shoes offer. A rigid sole and great support. I wear them everyday and never once have I had sore feet. I stand for almost eight hours a day and these are a lifesaver. My feet are a little wide and these accommodate them well.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great motion control running shoe...priced fairly and very comfortable. I have reorder this shoe many times!!
customer_reviews.author: marvin r.

customer_reviews.title: Great for flat feet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband who has EXTREMELY flat feet. He has been searching for the perfect shoe for years and I think we have finally found it. They are relatively light weight for an orthotic shoe. My husband also recently had knee surgery. Running has been hard on his knees. But, with these shoes, he feels much better when he runs. He runs on them on the treadmill and outside on the sidewalk and both feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Newman

customer_reviews.title: Toe box is a great fit. The mid foot is a little narrow
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit fairly well. Toe box is a great fit. The mid foot is a little narrow. I can see my socks between the tongue and the side panels. Other wise the sole is very stable. I've been wearing Brooks Beast for the last 3 years. Need to save some money this year and these are doing well. The Beast is still feels better.
customer_reviews.author: T. Vu

customer_reviews.title: A lot more comfortable than the foundation 8's
customer_reviews.text: Gone from my decimated Gel Foundation 8 to these. The foundation 8 worked great and I havent had any knee problems (from my sever overpronation since wearing them, some 1000 miles. Compared to my 8's these seem to have a soft heal, almost spongy, and the overall feel is a lot more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Foley

customer_reviews.title: Better wide shoe than New Balance
customer_reviews.text: These are replacing a pair of New Balance 4E running shoes, and these fit much better. The last and the upper are wider than the New Balance shoes, with these having much more room in the toe box. These are probably the first running shoes I've ever bought that were fully wide enough for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Watson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide mid-foot and these fit well in that area. The issue for me is the heel of my foot seems to slip out the back of the sneaker. They don't bit enough around my heel to keep it seated. Other than that, they are comfortable and seems like I will get a lot of wear out of them.
customer_reviews.author: hapkidoist73

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for me since I have flexible arches (flat feet)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for me since I have flexible arches (flat feet). Great support on my daily 7 mile walks. The fabric next to the heel wears out quickly but I just put a piece of duct tape there and carry on.
customer_reviews.author: Marmot

customer_reviews.title: These ASICS are the best thing to happen to my feet in a long ...
customer_reviews.text: With my god-given wide, flat feet I was suffering in other shoes. These ASICS are the best thing to happen to my feet in a long time. They would get one more star if they lasted just a bit longer. No worries though, they are well worth the cost and life-span. I'm ordering a new pair and the old ones may be worn after 4-months but they are still supportive and will do just fine for yard work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Holding up extremely well. Still comfortable. I wear as a nursing shoe and rotate them into my selection about once or twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: T. Delattre

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair for my son June 21 and the sole is coming apart. They would not return or refund the purchase. Very poorly made. Disappointed in the return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoe, inserts have less cushioning than they used to have though
customer_reviews.text: great motion control show- seems to me the inserts though are getting worse each year- less cushion. I have been buying the Aspics Gel shoes for about 10 years now. Overall a good shoe
customer_reviews.author: R. cohen

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable on my flat feet
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable on my flat feet. Gives me great arch support. No oain when I walk now. I highly recommend if you have flat or pronated feet.
customer_reviews.author: Pete P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Finding the right shoe for my super narrow size 16 feet, but these are good shoes and I have been impressed with them so far. They feel nice and stable, and i've even gotten complements from strangers on the look of the shoe. I gave the shoe 4/5 stars because they are a little wide, but I feel Asics run wide in general, but I knew that going in. I've had other shoes that fit better width-wise, but they cost much more.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Blume

customer_reviews.title: Does wonders for people with pronation issues in their feet
customer_reviews.text: I have a flexible arches which causes my ankles to pronate. My pain in my arches have resolved it self. These shoes are great, I'm order another pair now!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Simons

customer_reviews.title: sole coming loose
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was purchased for a child. In less than two months the tip, where the sole meets the upper fabric, is coming loose. As this is the first time this is happening I do not believe it is caused by improper care. Children do wear shoes out quickly but they should last at least a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Adamo

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit, Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, comfortable too new to know long term. Not as stable as Brooks Beast.
customer_reviews.author: James R Melton

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning this because it's too small, but it looks and feels great! The shoe seems to have been made with great care and high quality, I've ordered one in a larger size so I can wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Good but clunky.
customer_reviews.text: It's their most supportive shoe, so I expected some heft and clunk, but it's really clunky. Hoping I'll get more used to it. Wish they had more colors to choose from as well. ASICS always fit me right at the same size (12 for me).
customer_reviews.author: B. Appel

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I tend to walk on the outside of my feet. I am also 250lbs. These shoes help center my feet and the foam holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had them for a few weeks now and they feel great, fits well for me (standard size 12 mens ...
customer_reviews.text: 32, recovering from a fractured shin. They told me I needed stability or motion control shoes. shopped around and found these for $77 on Amazon when everywhere else was listing for over $100 on sale. Had them for a few weeks now and they feel great, fits well for me (standard size 12 mens shoe).
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'd have paid $40-$50 more in specialty stores. This one is motion controlled, and it does the job. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Yu

customer_reviews.title: One of the best I have ever worn1
customer_reviews.text: I walk several miles a day and suffered from several episodes of planar fasciitis. This is the shoe my podiatrist recommended. They work great and I have not had any foot problems for 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Lalawman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of these shoes, I wish Asics was still making them.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lo Brutto

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are pretty good. I have low arches and definitely am ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are pretty good. I have low arches and definitely am an overpronator. This shoes are great for long distance as they provide air flow and great cushioning. I am not getting anymore blisters towards my inner arches anymore with these after 5k or about three miles. I haven't tried longer distances, but I am sure they would still suit me.
customer_reviews.author: Science and Circuits

customer_reviews.title: Good Support
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoe and have been using it for years. Only complaint is that for some reason the inside of the left heel wears out before the rest of the shoe. Since it's just on one side it must be my body, never the less I have to replace them too often.
customer_reviews.author: James S. Berish Jr.

customer_reviews.title: recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Asics and I am very happy with my purchase. I have flat wide feet (12 4E) and these fit very comfortably. I used the amazon shoe fit software tool and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: steversarah

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: First impression 5 stars! Laced them up and wore them for a few hours today and wow! If these hold up as I expect they will (have had many pairs of Asics) then I have found my go-to sneaker in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W

customer_reviews.title: Size 11 4e fit like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Size 11 4e fit like a champ. These are very comfortable, offer good support for my flat feet, and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice wide toe box, which was what I wanted 😊
customer_reviews.author: SchamFam

customer_reviews.title: 000 steps a day on average and my feet feel great even though I'm severely flat footed and have had ...
customer_reviews.text: Wear these as work shoes all day long because I need arch support. I walk about 12,000 steps a day on average and my feet feel great even though I'm severely flat footed and have had problems with other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Oklahoma Reader

customer_reviews.title: Solve a lot of problems
customer_reviews.text: I have used these shoes for years now due to overpronation problems and other bio-mechanical problems. They are the most comfortable I have ever found. I buy them in the USA because the more conservative colors are provided there while on the European websites (where I live) all the models presented are fluorescent colors! I am in my 60s. ASICS could well learn to market these shoes in conservative colors to older people with foot problems. The 2E width fitting contributes to the comfort in my case.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Delighted
customer_reviews.text: These ASICS are fantastically comfortable and they look great too! I wear them with Birkobalance orthotics and my feet could not be happier. I walk 4 or 5 miles each day and work at the computer standing up most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: steve-ft-laud

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable right out of the box. I'm an ER nurse and work many hours on my feet, and although I've worn many good brands, these have been the best fit for me thus far. I have wide, flat feet, with awful pronation, but don't feel any pain anywhere on my body after 12-16 hour days on the floor since I started wearing these shoes. I had to purchase a half size larger for the right fit. The shoes hug my feet without squishing my toes or heel. The cushioning feels nice and supportive, and I haven't had any ankle rolling issues. Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: C. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe
customer_reviews.text: ASICS has discontinued this model. I hope they come out with something to replace it because it's the best shoe I've worn.
customer_reviews.author: B. Winkelman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, supportive shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm a female with big, flat feet. I work 12 hour shifts so it's critical that I wear supportive shoes. These are comfortable with great arch support. I've had the women's version of these before and they broke down rather quickly. I'm hoping these will last more than a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Night Shift Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for flat feet
customer_reviews.text: I have really flat feet and have trouble walking long distances without my feet hurting. Walking with shoes feels like walking on clouds. The shoes helped me run on the treadmill for a longer period of time. I would recommend this shoes for anyone with flat feet
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ramirez Jr

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, I have it only for one week now
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I have it only for one week now... My knees are OK, this is the most important thing! This is why I bought this shoes, for shock absorption...and as I said : so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Support and Cushioning
customer_reviews.text: These are the same model number I bought six months ago but these have a different tread design and give me better support than the previous ones which I really liked, so these were a big win.
customer_reviews.author: Boardrider

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Have worn this style for a couple of years now and no longer have heel pain. The shoes arrived when expected and in perfect condition. Very satisfied with the product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Birmingham customer

customer_reviews.title: A 12 would have fit much better. Quality is great as expected though
customer_reviews.text: I've worn many pairs of size 13 ASICS but for some reason these are gigantic on me. A 12 would have fit much better. Quality is great as expected though. Ive exclusively worn ASICS for the past 10 yrs. They are by far the best for flat wide feet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes, fit well
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes, fit well, and feet did not hurt as much at the end of the day. Mesh was nice so my feet could breath.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves them so much we are ready to order another pair for him to work in. Wide enough, good for overpronation.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect condition. Great deal. ASICS are the most comfortable shoes, great support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: runner
customer_reviews.text: They are great running shoes, lot's of support and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Great support shoes
customer_reviews.text: Asics run half size small for me so my normal 12 is a perfect fit in 12.5 with Asics. If you have heel pain , plantar fasciitis, or flat feet these shoes should give you pain free walking. I only wear these and Brooks Beast to stay pain free. These allow me to walk long distances and even jog without pain
customer_reviews.author: Dora R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product which I was looking for but had to ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product which I was looking for but had to return back because it was too wide for me. I had to keep order other model because it was 50$ cheaper than this. This style# would be my next shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of running shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Might not been the EXACT running shoes I was looking for, though it fits perfectly and it's one of the only brands that had the widest size available in the market, at least around my price range. Best if used on road or pavement.
customer_reviews.author: CiscoKid

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal, and a Comfortable Cushioned/Support Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Wider than expected (I occasionally need a 2E depending on the brand). These shoes were wide enough and are very comfortable. Good right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Terry123WV

customer_reviews.title: to narrow
customer_reviews.text: I got 2Es and they were to narrow at the arches for me.
customer_reviews.author: Greggy

customer_reviews.title: more comfortable than expected
customer_reviews.text: Sizing spot on, more comfortable than expected, great looking shoe! I am more than pleased. Also, I have planter faciatis and this shoe really makes a difference in my pain level when walking. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Dj

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are by far my favorite pair of athletic shoes. They fit very comfortably, give great support, and my feat do not hurt after wearing them all day.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good shoe except the insole is a little bit hard im going to replace insole with Dr.Scholls gell insoles
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: My everyday day workout shoe. EXCELLENT comfort, support and wear. It is sized somewhat on the small side
customer_reviews.author: harry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for my husband with plantar faciatis and really high arched feet.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: I have never gotten bad shoes from ASICS that’s why I always buy them.
customer_reviews.author: BBB

customer_reviews.title: They're a bit heavy but that's necessary for the excellent support the offer
customer_reviews.text: I'm an RN and I bought these shoes for work. They're a bit heavy but that's necessary for the excellent support the offer. They also run a tad large and wide, but I'm okay with that as I have wide feet and they tend to swell a little after standing on my feet all day. These shoes are perfect for what I bought them for.
customer_reviews.author: Jodamin

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fit just fine and better after a couple of good 5 k's
customer_reviews.author: Captain Steve

customer_reviews.title: They don't fit like the foundation 8
customer_reviews.text: They don't fit like the foundation 8. I wear the 4E wide. They are too narrow and sole is too hard. if your looking for the fit of the foundation 8 don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: carson h norris

customer_reviews.title: Seemed a bit on the cheap with Asics logo stripe ...
customer_reviews.text: Seemed a bit on the cheap with Asics logo stripe matrix being a screen-on vs sewn on... I was trying to find a replacement shoe for my Asics Forte model which was discontinued and this didn't do it for me.
customer_reviews.author: bnspired

customer_reviews.title: Too big... AND too small??
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit like previous versions. On one hand they're bigger - longer if you out them sole to sole with say, the foundation 8 - on the other hand the toe box is very shallow - perhaps from the extra cushioning in front. My big toes were getting smooshed - sending these back.
customer_reviews.author: JMAZE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a substitute for GT 2000-2 which they don't have any more.
customer_reviews.author: SSC

customer_reviews.title: It is an excellent shoe for a flat-footed overpronator like me
customer_reviews.text: I've been running in ASICS Gel Foundation for several years. It is an excellent shoe for a flat-footed overpronator like me.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bube

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great control shoes. Fit is good. Comfortable from the start.
customer_reviews.author: doofus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son is a nurse, and is on his feet all day. He loves these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley/White

customer_reviews.title: I love these even more than the old Asics they replaced
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. It's always a struggle for me to find great-fitting shoes (wide feet) and I had to replace my Foundation 10s, which are no longer sold. The 12s absolutely do the job.
customer_reviews.author: G Parker Mann

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: They are great shoes, I have plantar fasciitis and they really help me walk comfortably .
customer_reviews.author: Judy L Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not the best shoe. It runs a bit narrow in the forefoot even on a 4E.
customer_reviews.author: multanii

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I always used the Brooks Beast these are just as good and look better.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The arch support is good and is as I expected. The shoe is comfortable and as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: F. Lamberta

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: As someone with a flat feet, these shoes extremely comfortable. The soles inside have a good arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Srinivas

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Okay but I started having achillies pain long before the shoes were worn out. Swiched back to Kayano.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great control for folks like me who suffer from plantar faciatis.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: I like these the best
customer_reviews.text: I no longer run but I pronate badly and I live in these shoes. I have tried, Brooks Beasts, Chariots, etc. I like these the best.
customer_reviews.author: Larry M Karpe

customer_reviews.title: I love these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers. I am over pronate and 5 minutes after putting them on my feet feel great. Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this less than 2 months ago and the toe box already has a hole (see picture). i have only used this for walking and it is made of such poor quality. I switched from Mizuno to Asics and it looks like it was a big mistake. That is $93 dollars down the drain
customer_reviews.author: buddy

customer_reviews.title: The GT series is a more durable option from Asics
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of the GT series of Asics shoes, and thought I would change things up by giving the Gel Foundation line a try. Initially, I was very impressed...the soles are so comfortable. But, they seem to be a wider fit than the GT series, which did not provide the same Asics fit I was used to. The inside lining of the heels wore out within a month, and the laces broke after two months. I will definitely be going back to the GT series with my next shoe purchase (which unfortunately will be soon)
customer_reviews.author: HappyDad

customer_reviews.title: Bright Shoes
customer_reviews.text: While these shoes fit ok, I do wish that I would have received the color that I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Landino

customer_reviews.title: Be careful on aize needed. This shoe runs smaller in length than other pronation type shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I should have ordered size 11 but was concerned about the width being too wide not knowing how the sizes would run. My toes are at 'end ' of shoe and while using a regular sweat type sock I find them to be a little tight.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES WEAVER

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: As an overpronation walker these shoes help. Very comfortable,wish the right foot was a touch wider. Will see over time.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvan1852

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them. The wide size feels great! Will get more
customer_reviews.author: Schnauzer mom

customer_reviews.title: I believe it’s a great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: The toe of the shoe is a little wider than most but it didn’t bother me, I believe it’s a great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe -- haven't switched colors in a few years
customer_reviews.author: Loren Brandner

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe but it is bit small at the toe.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Sazer

customer_reviews.title: ASICS Gel Foundation 12
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes so far. My knee does not hurt after running. Great feel and support.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Q

customer_reviews.title: The shows are fine. Good support as recommended by my foot doctor
customer_reviews.text: The shows are fine. Good support as recommended by my foot doctor.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for overpronators
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for overpronators, greatly improves running efficiency, and reduces knee and ankle pain.
customer_reviews.author: Joey-JoeJoe

customer_reviews.title: Size Matters
customer_reviews.text: Used the size chart to convert from men's to women's and it was grossly inaccurate. Nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.author: easycomeeasygo

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, and great support
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I bought. After wearing the first pair, I had to get a second pair. The cushioning is like memory foam, very soft and cushy. Plus, these are extra wide which are hard to find in running shoes. The backs do not rub on my heals and they breath great. They are a bit pricey to me, but I think that's just how good running shoes are. I'm running in these 2-3 times/week on pavement.
customer_reviews.author: John Michael Koehler II

product_meta.title: Asics Mens Gel-Foundation® 12 Shoes
product_meta.description: Beat the heat, cold or rain with Asics men's athletic shoes. Durable synthetic construction is built to take everything you throw at it. Among the best athletic shoes on the market, this quality footwear displays true grit on the unyielding pavement, uneven wooded trails, unstable gravel and slippery grass. Transition easily from workout to chill out due to the high-quality comfort of a premium-grade leather and rubber sole. Of course, athletic performance is about inspiration as well as physics and practicality. That's why high-level competitors choose Asics Gel-Foundation 12 shoes: the attractive design is executed with both style and performance in mind. You work hard, so it stands to reason your sportswear should also be convenient. That's why Asics included a self tie type closure. This trusted design provides all of the security you expect to build your performance on a strong foundation, without sacrificing ease of use or absolute comfort. At the end of the day, there are plenty of reasons that the Gel-Foundation 12 line is a perfect example of running shoes. They're also great for relaxing or showing off your personal style around town. Understand why people trust these shoes: try them on for yourself.
feature_bullets: Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning Systems Attenuates shock during impact and toe-off phases, and allows movement in multiple planes as the foot transitions through the gait cycle.
SpEVA Midsole Material Improves bounce back characteristics and decreases midsole breakdown.
Guidance Trusstic System integrates Guidance Line construction for enhanced gait efficiency while providing midfoot structural integrity.
ComforDry Sockliner Provides cushioning performance and anti-odor properties for a cooler, drier, healthier environment.
Maximum Support Last Providing more depth and width throughout the mid- and forefoot, this accommodating last is ideal for athletes with higher volume feet or who wear orthotics.
